thread.title: Cubic Corporation to Participate in CL King's 13th Annual Best Ideas Conference
thread.title_full: Cubic Corporation to Participate in CL King's 13th Annual Best Ideas Conference

title: Cubic Corporation to Participate in CL King's 13th Annual Best Ideas Conference
text:
Cubic Corporation to Participate in CL King's 13th Annual Best Ideas Conference [September 08, 2015] Tweet 
Cubic Corporation ( NYSE: CUB ) today announced that John D. Thomas, executive vice president and chief financial officer, is scheduled to participate in a series of one-on-one institutional investor meetings at CL King's 13 th Annual Best Ideas Conference on Friday, September 11, at the Omni Berkshire Place Hotel in New York City. There will be no formal presentation. 
Related materials will be available for viewing and download atthe following website, www.cubic.com/Investor-Relations , under the News and Events tab. 
About Cubic Corporation 
Cubic Corporation designs, integrates and operates systems, products and services focused in the transportation, defense training and secure communications markets. As the parent company of two major business units, Cubic's mission is to increase situational awareness and understanding for customers worldwide. Cubic Transportation Systems is a leading integrator of payment and information technology and services to create intelligent travel solutions for transportation authorities and operators. Cubic Global Defense is a leading provider of realistic combat training systems, secure communications and networking and highly specialized support services for military and security forces of the U.S. and allied nations. For more information about Cubic, please visit the company's website at www.cubic.com or on Twitter ( News - Alert ) @CubicCorp. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150908005198/en/
